1148100.name: Life on the Hook
1148100.description:
Life on the Hook - is a short story about the cycle of life in which you, as a fisherman named Hrafn, begin your journey remembering the old days.

Immerse yourself in the short story of the life of a lonely fisherman named Hrafn, based on exploration and searching for items. Relax and enjoy the story of the game, where you'll get nothing but peace!

Feature of game:

- A small game for 30 minutes
- Good soundtrack
- Soulful story of a man's life
- A glimpse from the outside: how many moments in life a person misses by the eye and only in old age does he reflect on the past.
1148100.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
